actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To amend the Federal Credit Union Act to clarify that residents of certain neighborhoods which are underserved by depository institutions may become members of any Federal credit union which establishes a branch in such neighborhood.
short_title: Improved Availability of Banking Services in Underserved Communities Act

summary.text: Improved Availability of Banking Services in Underserved Communities Act - Amends the Federal Credit Union Act to provide that any resident of any neighborhood or community determined by the National Credit Union Administration Board to be underserved may be elected to any Federal credit union which establishes and maintains a branch in such locale.

titles.title: Improved Availability of Banking Services in Underserved Communities Act

To amend the Federal Credit Union Act to clarify that residents of certain neighborhoods which are underserved by depository institutions may become members of any Federal credit union which establishes a branch in such neighborhood.
